directions: Combine coconut water, cucumber, coconut flesh, mint, chile pepper, lemon juice, ginger, and salt in a blender; blend until smooth. Refrigerate until chilled through, about 2 hours.
Garnish with cucumber slices, grated coconut, and mint leaves before serving.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon minced fresh ginger root
2 tablespoons grated fresh coconut, or to taste
4  fresh mint leaves, or to taste
title: Cream of Coconut and Cucumber Soup
